items.title: OpenObserve
items.desc: OpenObserve is a simple yet sophisticated log search, infrastructure monitoring and APM solution. It is a full fledged observability platform that can reduce your storage costs by ~140x compared to other solutions and requires much lower resource utilization resulting in much lower costs.

items.title: Logs, Metrics, Traces
items.desc: OpenObserve is an open source observability platform that allows you to monitor logs, metrics, and traces efficiently. OpenObserve stores data in s3/gcs/minio/zure blob to achieve low cost data storage (~140x lower storage cost than Elasticsearch). It's stateless nodes architecture allows for extremely easly scaling. The advanced GUI for logs, metrics and traces coupled with dashboards allows you to not manage multiple systems for a different kinds of observability data (Think prometheus for metrics, Elasticsearch for logs, Jaeger for traces, grafana for dashboards). It supports SQL as primary query language, which means you do not have to learn yet another query language. PromQL is also support for querying metrics data. Inbuilt alerting mechanism allows you to send alerts to any platform (slack, teams, etc.). It is built in rust for high performance and memory safety.

useCases.title: Logs, Metrics and Traces
useCases.subtitle: The only observability platform you will need. No need to mix and match multiple tools to get the job done.

items.title: Logs
items.desc: OpenObserve provides an advanced embedded GUI for fast log searching with features like top 10, search around, SQL for query and custom VRL functions. It also has ingest and query time functions, making it suitable for both beginners and advanced users to build and run sophisticated queries.

items.title: Metrics
items.desc: OpenObserve offers long-term storage for Prometheus metrics in S3 with support for SQL and PromQL. Correlating logs and traces with metrics provides a comprehensive view of infrastructure, and high cardinality data storage offers a new level of functionality.

items.title: Traces with Opentelemetry
items.desc: Distributed tracing with opentelemetry provides a means to identify performance problems within a microservice as well across in a distributed architecture with precision. Traces enables pinpointing issues that would otherwise be difficult to detect.

features.title: OpenObserve Features
features.subtitle: Explore the transformative functionalities of OpenObserve and experience a new level of data observation

items.title: SQL based query language
items.desc: Utilize what you already know. Nothing new to learn here.

items.title: Alerts
items.desc: Scheduled and real-time alerts that allow users to promptly address critical issues and dispatch alerts to multiple platforms using templates, which improves system monitoring capabilities.

items.title: Dashboards
items.desc: Dashboards provide a comprehensive view of system behavior by presenting real-time data from logs, metrics, and traces in a visually appealing and efficient manner.

items.title: Data Storage in Obect Store
items.desc: Provides Storage functionality support in local Disk, s3, MinIO, GCS, Azure Blob resulting in 140x lower storage cost.

items.title: Dynamic Schema Evolution
items.desc: Ingest any and all logs without worrying about schema changes.

items.title: Security
items.desc: Fine grained role based access control (RBAC) for users and teams.

items.title: Advanced GUI
items.desc: Provides a user-friendly and intuitive graphical user interface for easier navigation and use of the platform.

items.title: User defined Ingest & Query functions
items.desc: Functions can allow you to parse, redact, and enrich your data at ingest and query time. Think aboout SSN or AWS keys redaction from logs and parsing already ingested logs to extract more information.

items.title: Localization
items.desc: Supports 10+ popular languages for the UI.
